document_data.name: Bonnet
document_data.mainbody: '''Bonnets''' were a type of hat common in agricultural communities.
document_data.Description: Bonnets had wide brims and were rather flimsy, but were thick enough to shelter their wearer's face and neck from [[the sun]].

Notable Wearers.Individuals: * [[Shelaerra Blundfeather]], the head of the household servants in [[Raventree Villa]], sometimes styled her long hair into a bun and wore it under a bonnet.<ref>{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2013)/Raventree Servants, Part IV}}
Notable Wearers.Regions & Settlements:
* In the [[Blade Kingdoms]], fanciful bonnets were common among noble women.
* Around the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], one of the many common pieces of headwear for [[Waterdeep|Waterdhavian]] women included pleated [[linen]] bonnets, often embroidered and featuring tassels.<ref>
